content: {A思考星光}Ripples of antiscia, resonating with the stars... Yeep~?!{短暂停} Are you... a star that fell from the sky?
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: {A想象}"When you <style=Highlight>reach the third Islet</style> in the Starsea, the starlight of friendship lying in wait <style=Highlight>is destined to lead you to a friend</style>..."
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: {A疑惑}For some reason... star shards always seem to fall near me when I'm stargazing. <style=SizeSmall>It's a mysterious phenomenon that I can never quite explain...</style>
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: And I love reading the mysteries of what's to come from these celestial connections...
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: The stars have just foretold a chance encounter, and here you are. Greetings, I am <style=NpcName>Frostia</style>.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: If you happen to spot any of those twinkling...{短暂停} <style=Highlight>Shooting Stars</style>! Would you mind collecting one for me?
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: Okay, I'll see if I can find some.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪
NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: It's just like... no one really knows {A思考星光}how the Shooting Stars end up on the beach. It's all so mysterious, and I just can't stop thinking about it.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: {A喜欢}What a special name, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>... It sounds like it's calling out to the stars. Do you ever glance up at them during your travels?
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: I suppose I can. Then...{短暂停} Based on the direction of the sky where you appeared, and the position of your planet...
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: No problem, just leave it to me!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: Can you do a reading for me?
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: {A思考星光}Aspect, the lure... House, the trap. Phase turns, light splits, a trine is cast. Within it, star embers caught adrift... Perhaps...
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: I hope this prophecy proves useful to you, yeep~! Oh and, speaking of surprises, please take this <style=Highlight>meteorite ore</style>, if you'd like.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: It's said that the differences that make each of us unique are just like the sea of twinkling stars. However, connect the dots, and we become connected to each other...
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: {A喜欢}Thank you. Oh, I must continue my journey for now, but I'll leave you my contact info... I hope our stars cross paths again, and... don't forget to come find me for another reading!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪
NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪
NPC初次偶遇模版图-1005幻雪_幻雪
